name: Hell Escape (yuulo, Aonekorigin)
description:
Hell is not the ideal place to spend eternity.

There are three elements in every trap and obstacle in your way: salt, sulfur, and mercury.

Each one destroys another, so you have drawn yourself a sketch so you don't forget. After many weeks of preparing your escape, it is time.

Be quick.

Controls:

Click and drag from your pile of cards (bottom of the screen) the element that neutralizes the enemy's card.
